title: STK has multiple international locations
statement: STK Steakhouse operates locations across multiple countries including the United States, Canada, Mexico, Qatar, UAE, England, and Italy.

citations.quote: Locations listed include: Arizona, California, Colorado, D.C., Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Massachusetts, Mexico Los Cabos, Nevada, New York, North Carolina, Puerto Rico, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Washington, Ontario, Qatar Doha, United Arab Emirates Dubai, England London, Italy Milan
